blocks.name: ax-inf
blocks.content: Axiom of Infinity. An axiom of Zermelo-Fraenkel set theory. This axiom is the gateway to "Cantor's paradise" (an expression coined by Hilbert). It asserts that given a starting set ` x ` , an infinite set ` y ` built from it exists. Although our version is apparently not given in the literature, it is similar to, but slightly shorter than, the Axiom of Infinity in [FreydScedrov] p. 283 (see ~ inf1 and ~ inf2 ). More standard versions, which essentially state that there exists a set containing all the natural numbers, are shown as ~ zfinf2 and ~ omex and are based on the (nontrivial) proof of ~ inf3 . This version has the advantage that when expanded to primitives, it has fewer symbols than the standard version ~ ax-inf2 . Theorem ~ inf0 shows the reverse derivation of our axiom from a standard one. Theorem ~ inf5 shows a very short way to state this axiom. The standard version of Infinity ~ ax-inf2 requires this axiom along with Regularity ~ ax-reg for its derivation (as theorem ~ axinf2 below). In order to more easily identify the normal uses of Regularity, we will usually reference ~ ax-inf2 instead of this one. The derivation of this axiom from ~ ax-inf2 is shown by theorem ~ axinf . Proofs should normally use the standard version ~ ax-inf2 instead of this axiom. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1993.)
blocks.origin:
axiom ax-inf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom ax-inf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s2 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0))))))
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: zfinf
blocks.content: Axiom of Infinity expressed with the fewest number of different variables. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfinf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  mpbi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))))
  ax-inf(s0, s1, hs0, s2)
  exbii(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))
  cbvalvw(hs0, s1, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))
  elequ1(hs0, s1, s0)
  exbidv(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  elequ1(hs0, s1, s2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))
  diff.wi.s(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  diff.wex.s(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s2), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zfinf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  mpbi(∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0)))))), ∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0)))))))
  ax-inf(s0, s1, hs0, s2)
  exbii(s0, (s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0))))), (s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0))))))
  anbi2i(s1 ∈ s0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0)))), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0)))))
  cbvalvw(hs0, s1, (hs0 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0))), (s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = s1, hs0 ∈ s0, ∃(s2,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0)), s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0)))
  elequ1(hs0, s1, s0)
  exbidv(s2, hs0 = s1, (hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0), (s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = s1, hs0 ∈ s2, s2 ∈ s0, s1 ∈ s2)
  elequ1(hs0, s1, s2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0))))
  diff.wi.s(s1, hs0 ∈ s0, ∃(s2,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, s0)
  diff.wex.s(s1, s2, (hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s0))
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs0 ∈ s2, s2 ∈ s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: axinf2
blocks.content: A standard version of Axiom of Infinity, expanded to primitives, derived from our version of Infinity ~ ax-inf and Regularity ~ ax-reg . This theorem should not be referenced in any proof. Instead, use ~ ax-inf2 below so that the ordinary uses of Regularity can be more easily identified. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 3-Nov-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm axinf2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wex(s0, wa(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s2, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  a1ii(wex(s0, wa(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s2, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1))))))))))), diffss(s0, s3))
  mpbi(wex(s0, wa(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s2, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1))))))))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))
  mp2an(wex(s0, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))), wcel(emptycls, com), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), com), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), com))))
  peano1()
  ax-gen(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), com), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), com)))
  peano2(cv(s1))
  spcev(s0, com, wa(wcel(emptycls, com), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), com), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), com)))), wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  inf3(s0)
  inf2(s0, s1, s2)
  zfinf(s0, s1, s2)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), com), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wcel(emptycls, com), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), com), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), com))))
  eleq2(cv(s0), com, emptycls)
  albidv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), com), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), com), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), com)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), com), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), com), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), com))
  eleq2(cv(s0), com, cv(s1))
  eleq2(cv(s0), com, csuc(cv(s1)))
  exbii(s0, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wa(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s2, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)))))))))))
  anbi12i(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s2, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1))))))))))
  bitri(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s2, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wal(s2, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  0el(s1, s2, cv(s0))
  df-rex(s1, cv(s0), wal(s2, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  albii(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)))))))))
  imbi2i(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1))))))))
  bitri(wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1))))))), wrex(s2, cv(s0), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)))))))
  sucel(s2, s3, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-rex(s2, cv(s0), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1))))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(emptycls, com), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), com), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), com))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, emptycls, com)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wal.s(s0, s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), com), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), com)))
  diff.wi.s(s0, wcel(cv(s1), com), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), com))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), com)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, csuc(cv(s1)), com)
  diff.csuc.s(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.com.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), com)
  diff.com.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axinf2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0,(∃(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s2, ¬ s2 ∈ s1)))∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s3,(s3 ∈ s2 ↔(s3 ∈ s1 ∨ s3 = s1)))))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
} = {
  a1ii(∃(s0,(∃(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s2, ¬ s2 ∈ s1)))∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s3,(s3 ∈ s2 ↔(s3 ∈ s1 ∨ s3 = s1))))))))), d(s0, s3))
  mpbi(∃(s0,(∃(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s2, ¬ s2 ∈ s1)))∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s3,(s3 ∈ s2 ↔(s3 ∈ s1 ∨ s3 = s1))))))))), ∃(s0,(∅ ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → suc(s1)∈ s0)))))
  mp2an(∃(s0,(∅ ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → suc(s1)∈ s0)))), ∅ ∈ _om, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ _om → suc(s1)∈ _om)))
  peano1()
  ax-gen(s1, (s1 ∈ _om → suc(s1)∈ _om))
  peano2(s1)
  spcev(s0, com, (∅ ∈ _om ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ _om → suc(s1)∈ _om))), (∅ ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → suc(s1)∈ s0))))
  inf3(s0)
  inf2(s0, s1, s2)
  zfinf(s0, s1, s2)
  anbi12d(s0 = _om, ∅ ∈ s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → suc(s1)∈ s0)), ∅ ∈ _om, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ _om → suc(s1)∈ _om)))
  eleq2(s0, com, emptycls)
  albidv(s1, s0 = _om, (s1 ∈ s0 → suc(s1)∈ s0), (s1 ∈ _om → suc(s1)∈ _om))
  imbi12d(s0 = _om, s1 ∈ s0, suc(s1)∈ s0, s1 ∈ _om, suc(s1)∈ _om)
  eleq2(s0, com, s1)
  eleq2(s0, com, suc(s1))
  exbii(s0, (∅ ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → suc(s1)∈ s0))), (∃(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s2, ¬ s2 ∈ s1)))∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s3,(s3 ∈ s2 ↔(s3 ∈ s1 ∨ s3 = s1)))))))))
  anbi12i(∅ ∈ s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → suc(s1)∈ s0)), ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s2, ¬ s2 ∈ s1))), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s3,(s3 ∈ s2 ↔(s3 ∈ s1 ∨ s3 = s1))))))))
  bitri(∅ ∈ s0, ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s2, ¬ s2 ∈ s1))), ∃(s1 ∈ s0, ∀(s2, ¬ s2 ∈ s1)))
  0el(s1, s2, s0)
  df-rex(s1, s0, ∀(s2, ¬ s2 ∈ s1))
  albii(s1, (s1 ∈ s0 → suc(s1)∈ s0), (s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s3,(s3 ∈ s2 ↔(s3 ∈ s1 ∨ s3 = s1)))))))
  imbi2i(s1 ∈ s0, suc(s1)∈ s0, ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s3,(s3 ∈ s2 ↔(s3 ∈ s1 ∨ s3 = s1))))))
  bitri(suc(s1)∈ s0, ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s3,(s3 ∈ s2 ↔(s3 ∈ s1 ∨ s3 = s1))))), ∃(s2 ∈ s0, ∀(s3,(s3 ∈ s2 ↔(s3 ∈ s1 ∨ s3 = s1)))))
  sucel(s2, s3, s1, s0)
  df-rex(s2, s0, ∀(s3,(s3 ∈ s2 ↔(s3 ∈ s1 ∨ s3 = s1))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, ∅ ∈ _om, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ _om → suc(s1)∈ _om)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, emptycls, com)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wal.s(s0, s1, (s1 ∈ _om → suc(s1)∈ _om))
  diff.wi.s(s0, s1 ∈ _om, suc(s1)∈ _om)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, com)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, suc(s1), com)
  diff.csuc.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.com.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, com)
  diff.com.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
}

blocks.name: ax-inf2
blocks.content: A standard version of Axiom of Infinity of ZF set theory. In English, it says: there exists a set that contains the empty set and the successors of all of its members. Theorem ~ zfinf2 shows it converted to abbreviations. This axiom was derived as theorem ~ axinf2 above, using our version of Infinity ~ ax-inf and the Axiom of Regularity ~ ax-reg . We will reference ~ ax-inf2 instead of ~ axinf2 so that the ordinary uses of Regularity can be more easily identified. The reverse derivation of ~ ax-inf from ~ ax-inf2 is shown by theorem ~ axinf . (Contributed by NM, 3-Nov-1996.)
blocks.origin:
axiom ax-inf2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wex(s0, wa(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s2, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wo(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: zfinf2
blocks.content: A standard version of the Axiom of Infinity, using definitions to abbreviate. Axiom Inf of [BellMachover] p. 472. (See ~ ax-inf2 for the unabbreviated version.) (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfinf2(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wex(s0, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbir(wex(s0, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wex(s0, wa(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))))))))))
  ax-inf2(s0, s1, hs0, hs1)
  exbii(s0, wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wa(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))))))))))
  anbi12i(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))))))))
  bitri(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))
  0el(s1, hs0, cv(s0))
  df-rex(s1, cv(s0), wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  bitri(wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))))))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))))))))
  ralbii(s1, cv(s0), wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))))))
  bitri(wcel(csuc(cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))))), wrex(hs0, cv(s0), wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))))))
  sucel(hs0, hs1, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-rex(hs0, cv(s0), wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))))
  df-ral(s1, cv(s0), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zfinf2(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0,(∅ ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0, suc(s1)∈ s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbir(∃(s0,(∅ ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0, suc(s1)∈ s0))), ∃(s0,(∃(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs0, ¬ hs0 ∈ s1)))∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ↔(hs1 ∈ s1 ∨ hs1 = s1))))))))))
  ax-inf2(s0, s1, hs0, hs1)
  exbii(s0, (∅ ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0, suc(s1)∈ s0)), (∃(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs0, ¬ hs0 ∈ s1)))∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ↔(hs1 ∈ s1 ∨ hs1 = s1)))))))))
  anbi12i(∅ ∈ s0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, suc(s1)∈ s0), ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs0, ¬ hs0 ∈ s1))), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ↔(hs1 ∈ s1 ∨ hs1 = s1))))))))
  bitri(∅ ∈ s0, ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs0, ¬ hs0 ∈ s1))), ∃(s1 ∈ s0, ∀(hs0, ¬ hs0 ∈ s1)))
  0el(s1, hs0, s0)
  df-rex(s1, s0, ∀(hs0, ¬ hs0 ∈ s1))
  bitri(∀(s1 ∈ s0, suc(s1)∈ s0), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ↔(hs1 ∈ s1 ∨ hs1 = s1))))))), ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ↔(hs1 ∈ s1 ∨ hs1 = s1)))))))
  ralbii(s1, s0, suc(s1)∈ s0, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ↔(hs1 ∈ s1 ∨ hs1 = s1))))))
  bitri(suc(s1)∈ s0, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ↔(hs1 ∈ s1 ∨ hs1 = s1))))), ∃(hs0 ∈ s0, ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ↔(hs1 ∈ s1 ∨ hs1 = s1)))))
  sucel(hs0, hs1, s1, s0)
  df-rex(hs0, s0, ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ↔(hs1 ∈ s1 ∨ hs1 = s1))))
  df-ral(s1, s0, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ↔(hs1 ∈ s1 ∨ hs1 = s1))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(s1)
}
